casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Earl James WATSON 387P05-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, David Learner, District Attorney, For State of NC. Mary March Exum, Attorney at Law, For Watson, Earl James. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of February 2017 by State of NC to Strike Reply to State's Response to Petition for Writ of Certiorari: "Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017." Ervin, J. recused
